title: BungeeCord报错
author: Kelcoin
txt_content:
17:05:54 [警告] Plugin performed restricted action, please inform them to use pr
oper API methods: Illegal thread group access
java.security.AccessControlException: Plugin violation: Illegal thread group acc
ess
    at net.md_5.bungee.BungeeSecurityManager.checkRestricted(BungeeSecurityManag
er.java:39)
    at net.md_5.bungee.BungeeSecurityManager.checkAccess(BungeeSecurityManager.j
ava:62)
    at java.lang.ThreadGroup.checkAccess(Unknown Source)
    at java.lang.Thread.init(Unknown Source)
    at java.lang.Thread.init(Unknown Source)
    at java.lang.Thread.<init>(Unknown Source)
    at net.cubespace.Yamler.Metrics.start(Metrics.java:212)
    at net.cubespace.Yamler.YamlerPlugin.onEnable(YamlerPlugin.java:14)
    at net.md_5.bungee.api.plugin.PluginManager.enablePlugins(PluginManager.java
:217)
    at net.md_5.bungee.BungeeCord.start(BungeeCord.java:232)
    at net.md_5.bungee.Bootstrap.main(Bootstrap.java:65)复制代码求破解

replies.author: qw1002429247
replies.txt_content: bungeecord是个娇气的东西-。-配置一有一点错误就会报错，这种情况最好删掉重新配置

replies.author: Kelcoin
replies.txt_content:
qw1002429247 发表于 2016-2-1 17:17
bungeecord是个娇气的东西-。-配置一有一点错误就会报错，这种情况最好删掉重新配置 ...
然而并没有什么卵用
什么插件的配置错了都不知道

replies.author: DustSettles
replies.txt_content:
BungeeSecurityManager报错，多半是缺少前置Yamler 
可去官网下载最新版本的插件，即可不需要前置
